content.question: Lines 6-10 (Ego...decessisse) describe how Pliny had

choices.label: written to Trajan about the differences between Egyptian patrons
been mistaken about whether Harpocras was manumitted
misunderstood the details relevant to Harpocras’s citizenship
been happy to be alone in his patronage to an Egyptian

content.answer: misunderstood the details relevant to Harpocras’s citizenship

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
